attributes.action: Hold parents fully responsible for their children's anti-social behaviour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many children are allowed to destroy the lives of their neighbours with impunity. Kids know they can get away with it and so push it. If parents were held truly FULLY accountable this would mostly stop. The police etc seem unconcerned offering nowt but palliative advice whilst the kids continue their cruel party ruining innocent people's lives. Please stop this before more people commit suicide.
